name: Liquidate
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Your body melts into a puddle covering your prior space. You can't be targeted, but can't cast any other spells or attack. You can still move. At the start of your next turn, you reform into your normal form.

If the terrain you are on is damaged or destroyed, you take 30 damage and reduce your maximum hit points by the same amount, as your liquid body is broken up and disrupted, inflicting grievous injuries when you reform.
empower: Removes the AP cost on this spell.
